solution_line_template: He collected {gertrude_eggs}+{blanche_eggs}+{nancy_eggs}+{martha_eggs} eggs for a total of <<{gertrude_eggs}+{blanche_eggs}+{nancy_eggs}+{martha_eggs}={total_collected_eggs}>>{total_collected_eggs} eggs.
He dropped {dropped_eggs} eggs so {total_collected_eggs}-{dropped_eggs} = <<{total_collected_eggs}-{dropped_eggs}={eggs_left}>>{eggs_left} eggs left
